synonyms: puruṣottama—Lord Puruṣottama; cakra—disc; padma—lotus; śaṅkha—conch; gadā—club; dhara—holding; śrī-acyuta—Lord Acyuta; gadā—club; padma—lotus; cakra—disc; śaṅkha—conch; dhara—holding.
translation: "Lord Puruṣottama holds the disc, lotus, conch and club. Lord Acyuta holds the club, lotus, disc and conch.
